Instead of `TextField`, we could use `IgnSpinBox` so we get nice support for floating point numbers, with min, max, etc. There's an example [here](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/507/add-gui-to-configure-grid/diff#Lsrc/gui/plugins/grid_config/GridConfig.qmlT60).

I'd also recommend:

* adding a title to the menu that says something like "Snap distances"
* padding the elements so that they're not pressed against the edges of the menu
* pre-filling the fields with the current snap values

Instead of TextField, we could use IgnSpinBox so we get nice support for floating point numbers, with min, max, etc. There's an example here.

I'd also recommend:

  • adding a title to the menu that says something like "Snap distances"
  • padding the elements so that they're not pressed against the edges of the menu
  • pre-filling the fields with the current snap values
